alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Jefferson; St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 08 at 4:55AM CDT until May 08 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Jefferson County in east central Missouri... East central Franklin County in east central Missouri... Southwestern St. Louis County in east central Missouri... * Until 545 AM CDT. * At 455 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Villa Ridge, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wildwood, Union, Eureka, Pacific, St. Clair, Byrnes Mill, Gray Summit, Villa Ridge, High Ridge, Cedar Hill, Murphy, Cedar Hill Lakes, House Springs, Dittmer, Scotsdale, Parkdale, Otto, Oermann, Robertsville, and Catawissa. This includes Interstate 44 in Missouri between exits 240 and 266. This also includes Route 66 State Park, Sandy Creek Covered Bridge Historic Site, and Robertsville State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
